name: space
description: Cypress BDD framework with Allure reporting and utilities

scripts.test: npm run cypress:run && npm run report:generate
scripts.test:full: npm run cypress:run && npm run report:generate && npm run report:open
scripts.test:login: NODE_ENV=dev npx cypress run --spec "cypress/e2e/login/login.feature" && npm run report:generate && npm run report:open
scripts.test:order: NODE_ENV=dev npx cypress run --spec "cypress/e2e/order/orderFlow.feature" && npm run report:generate && npm run report:open
scripts.test:all: NODE_ENV=dev npx cypress run && npm run report:generate && npm run report:open
scripts.test:qa: NODE_ENV=qa npx cypress run && npm run report:generate && npm run report:open
scripts.test:dev: NODE_ENV=dev npx cypress run && npm run report:generate && npm run report:open
scripts.auto:test: npm run clean && npm run test:full
scripts.auto:login: npm run clean && npm run test:login
scripts.auto:order: npm run clean && npm run test:order
